00025 // Constructor
00026 BdkDDalitzKsPiPiAmp::BdkDDalitzKsPiPiAmp(const char * name, 
00027                                          const char * title, 
00028                                          BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00029                                          Int_t componentsBit,
00030                                          Int_t defaultRhoSpin) :
00031   BdkAbsDDalitzAmp(name, title, pdf, componentsBit),
00032   _defaultRhoSpin(defaultRhoSpin)
00033 {
00034   initResonance();
00035   createParams();
00036   registerParams(_pdf);
00037 }

00052 // initialize the components:
00053 void BdkDDalitzKsPiPiAmp::initResonance() 
00054 {
00055 
00056   if (nComps()!=0) {
00057     cout << "BdkDDalitzKsPiPiAmp::initResonance(): Cannot call initResonance more than once!" << endl;
00058     return;
00059   }
00060   
00061   // Define all RooRealVar floating observables.
00062 
00063   /* The trackinfo variable defines the cyclycal nature of the resonances
00064      and the final state pions, with the following order. 
00065      See enum ResDaughters.
00066 
00067      index   particle
00068      1       Ks
00069      2       K+
00070      3       K-
00071      --------------
00072      index   resonance   dtr particles   dtr indices
00073      1                   K+ K-         23
00074      2                   Ks K-         13
00075      3                   Ks K+         12
00076   */
00077 
00078   int kstPIndex = -1;
00079   int kst0_1430PIndex = -1;
00080   int kst2_1430PIndex = -1;
00081   int nonresIndex = -1;
00082   int kst_1680PIndex = -1;
00083   
00084   // pi+pi- resonances:
00085   if (RHO0 & componentsBit()) {
00086     addComp("Rho0", 0.59, 10.0, 0.7758, 0.1503, PIP_PIM, _defaultRhoSpin);
00087   }
00088 
00089   if (RHO2S0 & componentsBit()) {
00090     addComp("Rho2s0", 0.0, 0.0, 1.465, 0.400, PIP_PIM, _defaultRhoSpin);
00091   }
00092 
00093   if (SIGMA & componentsBit()) {
00094     addComp("Sigma", 0.0, 0.0, 0.500, 0.400, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00095   }
00096 
00097   if (SIGMA2 & componentsBit()) {
00098     addComp("Sigma2", 0.0, 0.0, 0.500, 0.400, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00099   }
00100  
00101   if (OMEGA & componentsBit()) {
00102     addComp("Omega", 0.0, 0.0, 0.78268, 0.00849, PIP_PIM, SPIN1);
00103   }
00104 
00105   if (F0 & componentsBit()) {
00106     addComp("F0", 0.0, 0.0, 0.980, 0.044, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00107 
00108     // width for the F0 is taken from PRL 86, 765 (E791, 2001).
00109     // which looked at Ds->pi+pi-pi+
00110   }
00111 
00112   if (F0_1370 & componentsBit()) {
00113     addComp("F0_1370", 0.0, 0.0, 1.434, 0.173, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00114 
00115     // parameters for the F0_1370 are taken from PRL 86, 765 (E791, 2001).
00116     // which looked at Ds->pi+pi-pi+
00117   }
00118 
00119   if (F2 & componentsBit()) {
00120     addComp("F2", 0.0, 0.0, 1.2754, 0.1851, PIP_PIM, SPIN2);
00121   }
00122 
00123   // Ks pi+ resonances:
00124   if (KSTP & componentsBit()) {
00125     kstPIndex = nComps();
00126     addComp("Kst+", 0.0, 0.0, 0.8917, 0.0508, PI0_PIP, SPIN1);
00127   }
00128 
00129   if (KST0_1430P & componentsBit()) {
00130     kst0_1430PIndex = nComps();
00131     addComp("Kst0_1430+", 0.0, 0.0, 1.414, 0.290, PI0_PIP, SPIN0);
00132   }
00133 
00134   if (KST2_1430P & componentsBit()) {
00135     kst2_1430PIndex = nComps();
00136     addComp("Kst2_1430+", 0.0, 0.0, 1.425, 0.099, PI0_PIP, SPIN2);
00137   }
00138 
00139   if (KST_1680P & componentsBit()) {
00140     kst_1680PIndex = nComps();
00141     addComp("Kst_1680+", 0.0, 0.0, 1.717, 0.322, PIM_PI0, SPIN1);
00142   }
00143   // Ks pi- resonances:
00144   if (KSTM & componentsBit()) {
00145     addComp("Kst-", 0.0, 0.0, 0.8917, 0.0508, PIM_PI0, SPIN1,
00146             kstPIndex);
00147   }
00148 
00149   if (KST0_1430M & componentsBit()) {
00150     addComp("Kst0_1430-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.414, 0.290, PIM_PI0, SPIN0,
00151             kst0_1430PIndex);
00152   }
00153 
00154   if (KST2_1430M & componentsBit()) {
00155     addComp("Kst2_1430-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.425, 0.099, PIM_PI0, SPIN2,
00156             kst2_1430PIndex);
00157   }
00158 
00159   if (KST_1410M & componentsBit()) {
00160     addComp("Kst_1410-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.414, 0.232, PIM_PI0, SPIN1);
00161   }
00162 
00163   if (KST_1680M & componentsBit()) {
00164     addComp("Kst_1680-", 0.0, 0.0, 1.717, 0.322, PIM_PI0, SPIN1,
00165             kst_1680PIndex);
00166   }
00167 
00168   
00169   // Non-resonant:
00170   if (NONRES & componentsBit()) {
00171     nonresIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00172     addComp("Nonres", 1.03, 77, 0, 0, PIP_PIM_PI0, SPIN0);
00173   }
00174    
00175   // Masses of the above daughters
00176   _mDaug[0] = 0.0;
00177   _mDaug[1] = BdkDalitz::K0MASS;
00178   _mDaug[2] = BdkDalitz::PIMASS;
00179   _mDaug[3] = BdkDalitz::PIMASS;
00180 }
Generated on Sun Nov 11 16:23:41 2007 for BToDKTo3piK by  1.4.7
